channel.title: I need a website banner please
channel.description:
Right, I need:
A professional style font saying 'Maurador' Transparent BG. Maybe a red dragon comming over the top of the M
200 x 100
Needs to go with a white background. I also want it be slightly 3D. And if you can possibly spare the time a small logo with an M, same styles, I am not in need of this, it'd just be handy.
Thanks.
